name: The Spoilt Meal!
description:
Earlier this week the victim was presented with a meal cooked by Poirot 
 he said it was sub-par at best could the chef have done something?

name: The Inconsiderate Detective!
description:
Holmes always liked to deduce thing's about anyone he saw 
 many disagreed with his views and deductions 
 maybe the victim also disagreed

name: The Aspiring Assistant!
description:
Jack Watson has always been an assistant detective for as long as i can remember 
 maybe he wanted to challenge his mentor to a game?

name: The Fashion Betrayal!
description:
I overheard a conversation between selina and the victim once 
 they accused each other of stealing i dont know what but after that 
 neither really spoke much.

name: The Secret Meetings of a Rich Man
description:
I heard that the victim owed william a lot of money 
 apparently during a meeting he convinced william to bet 
 half his money on a soon to fail company costing him millions 
 could that meeting have something to do with his death?

name: The Paranoid Puppet!
description:
Roux is a fashion model i went to see her at a fashion show once 
 she was beautiful unlike any other but some say shes more like a puppet to the clothes than a person 
 i heard she was kidnapped once by a stalker and was never the same afterwards 
 perhaps she was reminded of the stalker by the victim?
